synopsis.text:
With a knack for computers and a passion for robotics, Saotome Kazuya, a bright student at a prestigious university, finds himself in an unexpected predicament when a vengeful rival's virus-laden CD leads him to acquire May, a petite yet powerful android girl, from a mysterious website. Designed to assist with household chores, May stands at a mere four inches tall, and her arrival brings a whirlwind of amusing and awkward situations into Kazuya's life.

As he struggles to keep up with May's antics and the financial burden of affording her, Kazuya must also navigate the challenges of winning over his charming neighbor, Kasumi, who never misses an opportunity to tease him. With May's help, Kazuya might just have a chance at cleaning up his life and capturing Kasumi's heart.

Meanwhile, the relentless Cyberdyne Co., from which May originated, is determined to retrieve their android and will stop at nothing to collect Kazuya's unpaid dues. Can Kazuya find a way to keep May by his side while fending off the company's attempts and balancing his complicated love life? Join Kazuya, May, and a colorful cast of characters as they explore the thrilling world of artificial intelligence and robotics in this delightful anime adventure.
